detail_desc: Short, three-strand necklace made of metal and glass beads. One of the chains has a pendant. Adjustable length 40-47.5 cm.
Short, V-neck dress in a viscose weave with long sleeves and gathered, buttoned cuffs. Double layer at the top of the front, a gathered seam under the bust, and a rounded hem. Unlined.

Fitted sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details and long sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Straight-cut jacket in sturdy cotton denim with a faux shearling collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, patch front pockets and one inner pocket. Lightly padded. Quilted lining in a cotton weave.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Short-sleeved Henley shirts in soft jersey with a round neck and button placket.
Shorts in soft, washed cotton with a zip fly, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a button.
5-pocket jeans in washed cotton denim with hard-worn details. Looser fit with a low waist and crotch, zip fly and button, and tapered legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Small, sturdy, imitation leather shoulder bag with a quilted front, zip at the top and one small inner compartment. Strap in imitation leather and metal chain. Lined. Size 5x13x19.5 cm.
Pyjamas with a top and tight shorts in jersey made from a cotton blend. Shorter top in a wide fit with dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
T-shirt in hard-washed cotton jersey with a text print on the front.
Flared, calf-length skirt in flock-print tulle. High waist with covered elastication. Lined.
Block-striped cardigan in soft organic cotton with fine-knit and textured-knit sections, buttons down the front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a turned-up hem.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Lace Brazilian briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Cardigan in fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front and long sleeves with a small frill trim at the cuffs.
Multi-strand necklace decorated with glass beads in various colours. Adjustable length 50-57 cm.

Long, straight-cut shirt jacket in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets and concealed pockets in the side seams. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.
Hat in a soft, textured-knit wool blend with a thermal fleece trim on the inside.
Fitted vest top in soft jersey.
Shorts in printed, lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Sewn-in turn-ups at the hems with the reverse side showing.

Lined triangle bikini top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in different ways at the back and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Metal fastener at the back.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, chest pocket, buttons down the front and a rounded hem.

Jacket knitted in soft, thermal fleece with a hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, and kangaroo pockets. Jersey trim around the hood, pockets, cuffs and hem. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.
Top and pair of shorts in soft, brushed jersey. Top with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Shorts with an elasticated waist and side pockets.
Long jumper in a soft knit. Relaxed fit with a V-neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top woven in a cotton blend with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and wide, frill-trimmed smocking at the top. Seam at the waist and a flared peplum.

Short dress in airy plumeti chiffon with a wide drawstring neckline and long raglan sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Partly lined in jersey.
Leather sandals with padded, wrapover straps. Leather insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved tops in soft, ribbed, organic cotton jersey with a round neckline and buttons at the back of the neck.
Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Silicone trim at the hem, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, side support and a metal fastener at the back.
Top in organic cotton jersey with narrow elastication around the neckline and short raglan sleeves.

Base layer set in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned sections. Top with long raglan sleeves, contrasting colour seams and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with ribbing at the waist and hems. The set is designed with the minimal number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Hooded top in light sweatshirt fabric with low dropped shoulders, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details in a looser fit with a regular waist, button fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved romper suit in soft, organic cotton slub jersey with buttons at the top and an open chest pocket. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs and hems.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Wide, raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Double-breasted coat in woven fabric containing some wool with a soft brushed finish. Notch lapels, side pockets, a detachable tie best at the waist and a single back vent. Lined.
Popover jacket in woven fabric with a drawstring hood and zip at the top. Large front pocket with a concealed zip, and elastication at the cuffs. Mesh lining.

Calf-length dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a V-neck, gathers at the shoulders and short sleeves. Seam at the waist with a drawstring at the sides and gathered seams on the skirt for added width and soft draping. Unlined.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, padded hood, stand-up collar, zip down the front and side pockets. Narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Double-layered jersey top in a cotton blend with hard-worn details, raw edge cuffs and a raw-edge, rounded hem.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a matching tie belt. Collar and concealed buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves, buttoned cuffs and loops at the waist.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with a racer back and elastic hem.
Short dress in soft jersey with short sleeves, a seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.

Short, cold shoulder dress in a viscose crêpe weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist and a wide lace trim at the top and hem. Unlined.
Long, sleeveless jumpsuit in viscose jersey in a straight cut at the top with spaghetti shoulder straps. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and straight legs.
Short dress in an airy weave with narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck with narrow ties at the front, and a rounded hem.
Double-breasted pea coat in sturdy fabric with a lightly brushed finish. Notch lapels, welt front pockets with a flap, and side pockets. Lined.
Lightweight, padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable hood and zip with a chin guard. Side pockets and narrow elastication around the hood, at the cuffs and hem.
Block-coloured top in cotton jersey with a text print, round neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.

Tailored, high-waisted shorts in woven fabric. Concealed elastication at the waist and a concealed zip and two pairs of hook-and-eye fasteners at one side. Side pockets with decorative metal studs, fake welt back pockets and short slits in the sides.
Cable-knit jumper knitted in a soft wool and mohair blend with a V-neck, wide raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit, pair of trousers and a hat in soft, organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with press-studs on the shoulders and at the crotch. Trousers with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist. Hat with a ribbed hem.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a pile-lined, drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Pile lining.
Top in linen jersey with a V-neck and short sleeves.

Trousers in washed, lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake zipped pockets at the top and a fake welt pocket at the back. Low crotch and tapered legs with decorative stitching at the knees and wide ribbing at the hems.
Joggers in soft cotton corduroy in a relaxed fit with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly and slightly lower crotch. Side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Pyjama bottoms in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Sports trousers in fast-drying, functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Legs with taped details and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a round neck and straight-cut hem.
Hat in braided paper straw with a wide grosgrain band. Width of brim 7 cm.
Imitation leather sandals with metal buckles, moulded rubber insoles and fluted rubber soles. Platform approx. 3.5 cm.
Top in a sturdy, ribbed viscose blend with a round, scallop-edged neckline, 3/4-length trumpet sleeves and a decorative hole pattern and scalloped edge at the cuffs.
Short-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a seam and gathered flounce at the hem.
Leggings in stretch fabric, one pair in denim, and one pair in twill. Elasticated waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and a fake fly.
Leggings in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with an elasticated waist. One pair with an all-over print. The cotton content of the leggings is organic.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Trousers in soft leather with a regular waist and fly with a concealed zip and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Small flap front pockets with a press-stud, a back pocket and straight legs with visible seams and a slit at the hems. Lined.
Wide, block-coloured polo-neck jumper in soft, rib-knit wool containing some cashmere. Dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with wide, sewn-in turn-ups.
5-pocket, high-waisted trousers in stretch twill with a zip fly and button and skinny legs.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and ties at the sides.
Short-sleeved sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric.
Calf-length skirt in a soft, jacquard-patterned knit containing some wool with a fluffy finish. High waist with a ribbed waistband, and a slit at the back of the hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with motifs, a lined hood, kangaroo pocket, ribbing at the cuffs and hem and slits in the sides. Soft brushed inside.

Set with a dress and matching leggings in soft cotton. Dress in washed denim with a collar, buttons at the top, short butterfly sleeves and a chest pocket. Gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined. Leggings in jersey with an elasticated waist.
Short, straight-cut nightdress in soft jersey.
